turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Firebringer.
turn.1: What was the longest-running American musical on Broadway in terms of performances?
turn.2: Firebringer  Firebringer is a musical with music and lyrics by Meredith Stepien and Mark Swiderski, and book by Matt Lang, Nick Lang, and Brian Holden (additional writing by Meredith Stepien).
turn.3: What was the story of the musical about?
turn.4: The musical is set in the prehistoric era of mankind and deals with the ramifications of new inventions.
turn.5: When was the last time the musical was performed?
turn.6: The musical was performed between July 6 and August 7, 2016, at Stage 773 in Chicago, Illinois.
turn.8: The StarKid Productions group put the entire musical up on YouTube on December 31, 2016.
turn.9: Was there another recording of the musical?
turn.10: The musical's cast recording was released on iTunes a month earlier on November 22, 2016.
turn.11: Who was the narrator of the musical?
turn.12: The show begins with the ensemble ("Fire"), after which Molag (Lauren Walker), acting as narrator, speaks to the audience about fire and brings them back in time to tell the story of its invention ("We Are People Now").
